tiles.displayName: WAF Request Protection Capabilities by Rule ID
WAF Edge Nodes By Requests - Top 10

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | stats count(Request) by 'Client IP'
'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | stats count by 'Request Verb'

'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe and 'WAF Log Type' in (human_challenge_logs, js_challenge_logs) | fields -Entity, -'Entity Type', -'Host Name (Server)', -'Problem Priority', -Label | stats count by 'WAF Log Type'

savedSearches.description: WAF Top 10 Source IP Pie diagram

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | rename 'Client IP' as 'Source IP' | stats count by 'Source IP' | top limit = 10 Count
'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | fields Action | stats count by Action
'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | rename URI as Requests | stats distinctcount('Request ID')

savedSearches.description: WAF Top 10 Country - count - table format

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | rename 'Client Host Country' as Country | stats count by Country | where Country != null | top limit = 10 Count

savedSearches.description: WAF Request Agents Top 10- Table Format

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | stats count by 'Request Agent' | where 'Request Agent' != null | top limit = 10 Count
'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe | stats count by 'Geo IP' | jsonExtract field = 'Geo IP' Country = '$.country_name' | stats count as Count by Country

'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe and 'WAF Log Type' in (human_challenge_logs, js_challenge_logs) | fields -Entity, -'Entity Type', -'Host Name (Server)', -'Problem Priority', -Label | stats count by 'WAF Log Type', Action
'Log Source' = wafv1_source_coe and 'Log Type' != caching_logs | stats count as logrecords by 'Client Host Country' | sort -logrecords
